headline: HP Leadership Shift And Chinese Chip Sourcing Reshape Investment Story
summary: HP Inc. (NYSE:HPQ) has named Bruce Broussard as Interim CEO following the departure of Enrique Lores. The board has begun a search for a permanent chief executive to lead the next phase of the company. At the same time, HP is evaluating Chinese memory chip suppliers to secure DRAM during an ongoing global shortage. For investors watching NYSE:HPQ, this leadership change and supply chain review comes as the stock trades around $19.26. Shares have seen a 12.9% decline year to date and a 40.2%...
